name.description: Display name for this tour (e.g., 'Buy Program Tickets - List View')

page_name.description: The page this tour belongs to (e.g., 'BuyProgramTickets')

view_id.description: Optional identifier for a specific view within a page (e.g., 'list', 'form')

is_active.description: Whether this tour is currently enabled

description.description: Optional description for admins about what this tour covers

mandatory_selector.description: Optional CSS selector for an element that must be present for the tour to run

mandatory_selector_missing_message.description: Custom message to display if the mandatory selector element is not found
